definition: to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine

sentences.english: Flashes its inner pectoral fins when disturbed (Ref. 9710).
sentences.chinese: 閃現它的內胸鰭當被驚擾時。

sentences.english: The lights of the houses gleamed dully on the hillside.
sentences.chinese: 那些房屋的燈光沉悶地閃現在山邊。

sentences.english: A faint hope still flickered in his breast .
sentences.chinese: 她心中仍然閃現着一線希望。

sentences.english: His latest novel came to him while sitting in traffic in Tokyo.
sentences.chinese: 他最新的小說是在坐車時突發奇想，靈光閃現。

sentences.english: My eyes flash open in the predawn gray .
sentences.chinese: 我一下子睜開了雙眼，眼前閃現的是黎明前的灰暗。

sentences.english: The ratio of the earth's inner spin to its outer spin directly affects the flash of time unfoldment.
sentences.chinese: 地球內旋到外旋的比例會直接影響到時間展開的閃現。

sentences.english: In the world where the humming-bird flashed ahead of creation.
sentences.chinese: 在這世界裏，蜂鳥卻閃現於萬物之前。

sentences.english: A series of scenes appeared in front of her eyes, how dramatic, and how abstractive .
sentences.chinese: 一幕幕景象在她眼前閃現，是那樣奇妙而迷人呀。

sentences.english: But success comes down not to inspiration, but perspiration. Winston Churchill put it best
sentences.chinese: 但成功並不光是靈感閃現，而是努力和漢水。

sentences.english: Tower of Radiance now procs from Holy Shock, Flash of Light, Holy Light or Divine Light.
sentences.chinese: 現在由震擊，閃現，聖光和神光觸發。

sentences.english: Strung on a coat of mail, they sparkle in a dramatic gradation of winter tones.
sentences.chinese: 盔甲似的設想，閃現出注目誘人的冬日幻變色彩。

sentences.english: But other talents still manage to emerge, independent of those two mighty godfathers .
sentences.chinese: 但仍有才華得以閃現，獨立於兩位教父級大師。

sentences.english: Her eyes flashed a shading glance.
sentences.chinese: 她的眼中閃現出一絲陰鬱的目光。

sentences.english: A fresh idea flashed upon his mind.
sentences.chinese: 一個新主意閃現在他的腦海裏。

sentences.english: This was the instance that occured first to my mind.
sentences.chinese: 首先在我腦中閃現的就是這個例子。

definition: divine light (around the Buddha)/a halo/a miraculous column of light/(slang) jolly good!

to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine
to appear before one's eyes/to come into view/to float into appearance/to come back (of images from the past)/to emerge/it emerges/it occurs (to me that..)
to flit across/to sweep past/to glance (strike at an angle)
lit. hiding the sky and covering the earth (idiom); fig. earth-shattering/omnipresent/of universal importance
to pervade/to fill the air/diffuse/everywhere present/about to inundate (water)/permeated by (smoke)/filled with (dust)/to saturate (the air with fog, smoke etc)
to soar/to rise high into the air
